mapper.select: select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select a.pnum, a.comm_content, b.subject, b.reg, c.board_name, c.board_mapping from (select * from comm_board where comm_content like '%${keyword}%') a, post_board b, boardtype c where a.pnum=b.pnum and b.board_type=c.board_type) list) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}

select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select * from post_board where subject like '%${keyword}%' or post_content like '%{keyword}%' and board_type in (1,2) order by reg desc) list) where r between #{keyword} and #{keyword}

select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select * from post_board where subject like '%${keyword}%' or post_content like '%{keyword}%' and board_type in (4,5,6,7) order by reg desc) list) where r between #{keyword} and #{keyword}
select * from (select rownum r, a.* from (select * from certiinfo where cname like '%${keyword}%' order by cnum) a) where r between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select cname from (select rownum r, list.* from (select cname, sum(applied) as applied from pass_rate where cyear >= 2020 group by cname order by applied desc) list) where r between 1 and 10

select cnum, cname from (select rownum r, list.* from (select b.cnum, a.* from (select cname, sum(prac_apply) as applied from pass_rate_nat where cyear >= 2020 group by cname) a, certiinfo b where a.cname = b.cname order by a.applied desc) list) where r between 1 and 10
select * from (select rownum r, list.* from (select b.cnum, a.cname from pass_detail a, certiinfo b where a.cname=b.cname order by a.${order} desc) list) where r between 1 and 10

select cnum, cyear, cround, clevel, TO_CHAR(docRegStart1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegStart1, TO_CHAR(docRegEnd1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegEnd1, TO_CHAR(docRegStart2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegStart2, TO_CHAR(docRegEnd2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docRegEnd2, TO_CHAR(docTestStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docTestStart, TO_CHAR(docTestEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docTestEnd, TO_CHAR(docResultStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docResultStart, TO_CHAR(docResultEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docResultEnd, TO_CHAR(docSubmitStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docSubmitStart, TO_CHAR(docSubmitEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as docSubmitEnd, TO_CHAR(pracRegStart1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegStart1, TO_CHAR(pracRegEnd1,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegEnd1, TO_CHAR(pracRegStart2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegStart2, TO_CHAR(pracRegEnd2,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracRegEnd2, TO_CHAR(pracTestStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracTestStart, TO_CHAR(pracTestEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracTestEnd, TO_CHAR(pracResStart,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracResStart, TO_CHAR(pracResEnd,'""YYYY-MM-DD"T"HH24:MI') as pracResEnd from certidate where cnum is null
